title: Create A Way To Check All The Skins You Own

replies.body:
Like how they have the champions tab in the profile section, have another tab saying skins 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I'm already imagining a checklist, ordered by champion or maybe theme, that includes all the  available skins with little red crosses next to ones you own. Maybe you could even mark the ones you want with a little star or something and that could be a wish list. 

A skin collection is hard to visualise currently but if something like that existed, far out, I'm convinced more people would be hooked attempting to 100% the skin collecting game.
